author: Debbie Beland

review: It's a very handy piece of tech and very easy to set up and use.  The only problem I have with it is a major problem:  while watching shows via the Netflix and the amazon prime app, it loses wifi connection frequently (sometimes up to 2 and 3 times per show).  I've tried troubleshooting it with suggestions on the website and keep the software up-to-date, but it keeps dropping the wifi.We have a very old Nintendo Wii in the same room (that we used for Netflix) and its wifi never dropped out, so I really don't think the problem is with the distance to my router.
author: A. Jaffrey

review: It gets the video to my TV and my kids can use it but interface is a bit clunky and can sometimes be slow. When using the Youtube app it's almost unbearably slow.  I have the Fire controller app on my iPhone but when searching it won't even let me use a keyboard to enter search terms on the Youtube app.

review: I love it.  I hooked it up in less than 5 minutes and it was ready to go.  On screen instructions were very easy to follow.  Remote was veryeasy to use.  All in all the Fire TV Stick is a great product!
